name: Shipping Company
description:
Shipping Company is a small and simple economy simulation game about managing a shipping company. The player can choose between different maps and ship types.

Included Content

The following ship types are available in-game:

  • Passenger ship
  • Container ship
  • Bulk cargo ship (for stone, coal and ore)
  • Oil tanker (for gasoline, heavy oil and gas)

You can play on the following maps:

  • Europe
  • North America
System requirements
  • Windows 7 or newer OR amd64 compatible Linux distro
  • 500 MB of free RAM available on the system
  • 60 MB of free disk space
  • OpenGL ES 3 compatible GPU (older Intel Graphics will not work)
Credits for third-party tools & content

The creation of this game was made possible with the following tools:

  • Godot Engine, a free and open source game engine
  • Blender, the open source 3D modeling tool
  • GIMP, the free & open source image editor
  • The 3D models in this game use textures licensed from textures.com. All rights reserved.
